        public boolean validateDeployOrderArmies​(Player p_player,
                                         java.lang.String p_noOfArmies)

        Parameters:
        p_player - player to create deploy order
        p_noOfArmies - number of armies to deploy
        Returns:
        boolean to validate armies to deploy

                 throws InvalidCommand,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        InvalidMap
        Issues order for player.
        Parameters:
        p_issueOrderPhase - current phase of the game
        Throws:
        InvalidCommand - exception if command is invalid
        java.io.IOException - indicates failure in I/O operation
        InvalidMap - indicates failure in using the invalid map
